sub_title: Learning experience designer, facilitator, trainer, artist, improviser.
summary:
A creative, passionate and resourceful  professional with a keen interest in creating human and learning experiences for a world that is able to solve its problems creatively and in a peaceful, collaborative way.

I bring to life powerful, inspiring, connecting gatherings that create space for learning, collaboration and humanness. I'm passionate about creating events that are filled with aliveness, playfulness and thoughtfulness. I strive for deep, long-lasting impact that helps both our inner and outer world thrive. I believe that this can happen through real collaboration, engaging and thinking in broader ecosystems, recognizing our interconnectedness and taking care of our inner processes with a vision of contributing to the betterment of our communities, societies and world(s). I care about supporting those with a social mission and those who dedicate their lives to the betterment of their communities/world. 
 
I am a caring team member and empowering team leader.  A flexible individual who is ready to learn something new every day. An inspiring and energetic co-worker keen on sharing ideas and leading creative thinking processes to find solutions to the complex challenges of today's world. 

Experience

- 7 years of experience of creating and managing an ever-growing Learning Solutions team;
- 10 years experience of designing innovative learning experiences and gatherings (retreats, workshops, online courses, training of trainers, conferences, etc.)
